content.label: Debits cards are always declined, even when going through Apple pay, problem for over a month now.  Ive contacted my banks, they claim it never even shows on their end a process to run the cards are being made.  Ive called Sonic customer service multiple times and they are zero help.  I should not gave to buy Sonic gift cards at walmart to order drinks, which is why I stopped going to like maybe once or twice in a month.
I just hate that you can’t order what’s on the menu as if you were there. The app menu is extremely limited and basic looking. It needs a complete overhaul.
Super easy to use. Fast and so convenient. I love the app

Food temperature is so important.  Why would a bun on a hamburger be cold?  And why does it take 10 minutes to get a drink?  I do love Sonic and appreciate your presence.  Just a few remarks to improve.  Thank you for all that you do good’
The Sonic app is the easiest fastest way to order.  AND you get great deals through the app.  It’s the way to go.
Easy & Fast - remembers prior orders
Finally a deaf friendly without going through the drive through!  Thank you!!!

Love how easy it is to place an order and pick up.  I appreciate how the order is made when you place it in the app.  Others seem to make your food when you arrive at the restaurant.  Sonic makes it when you place the order, minimizing time waiting for your food.

I love everything about your app. I use it all the time. I can order from work be here pick up my lunch and back to work in about 10 minutes it’s very fast. I think you for that. I wish there was an option on your ice tea or you could get half-and-half tea I end up getting sweet but I would like to get half-and-half I appreciate it thank you so much
Always handy and quick. I do wish they had a tipping option on the app though because I don’t always carry cash with me and like to tip the carhop when she delivers my food.
Our Sonic is the Best ever. Thank you !
5 stars always good fresh and right

I love Sonic and I do enjoy the app. My only complain is that not everything that is available on the menu when you drive up to order at Sonic is available on the app which is frustrating. I do enjoy the order ahead feature and the half price drinks and slushes when ordering on the app.
Good, solid app

Love this app I use it at least twice a week sometimes more! Can order set my time I’ll be at store pull in stall click I’m here and normally food is out on time! Plus you get a bonus every month of something! Sometimes $1 chili cheese coney sometimes it’s a little off of the promo menu item that month! Very happy customer!
Real easy to order

Great responsive app that works really quickly. My ONLY annoyance is that I’d like to know the cost of the upgrades while I’m making my selection. It’s annoying to have to go back to the checkout to get final prices with upgrades then go back if I want to adjust my costs.
Everyone here is amazing!!! Especially Ms. Debbie!!!!
I would love if we could order the sugar free slushes on the app.
I love the Sonic in El Dorado. My order is always right and they are so nice.
It’s so easy and love when I arrive at the stall and tells me the progress of the order it’s amazing; kids have it so easy they have no clue how cool this app is! Get it!

Every time I open the app it signs me out. No support for touch ID or Face ID. Touch ID has been out since the iPhone 5S and we’re on the iPhone 12 now so there’s no excuse for not including it. The ordering system could be a little bit more user-friendly when it comes to selecting your previous orders.If this was an app for a small business I could see these problems but this is a nationwide corporation so they should at least have a professional app.
Love this app everything about it is GREAT

title.label: Great place for a fast meal.

content.label: Love this place. Great food and prices for a fast meal.
Great food never a issue that’s why I always come here for dinner during work.
I ordered bacon and paid for bacon on the app. No bacon was on my sandwich!!!

I enjoy being able to pre order my drinks and food. However not having the full menu of flavors on the app is a little disappointing. Even if you could type in the flavors you wanted would be a lot better if you ask me.
Very convenient! I’ve been using the App for over a year, and there has never been a mistake with my order!
I use a lot of apps for many types of businesses. The Sonic app is soooo easy to use AND results in half-price drinks all day!
There are some items you can’t get on the app.  Like Ched ‘R’ bites.
My Sonic would not honor the Chili Cheese Dog for a $1!  Had no clue about the deal.
Most of the time, Sonic gets my order correct.  I would love the opportunity to order a half sweet/half Unsweet tea. Even to put a place to add a note might work.
I enjoy being able to order ahead, customize and pay online.
The app is super convenient and adds extra discounts. The only downfall is it crashes multiple times during an order.
The app sometimes glitch out and charge my card 2 or 3 times
My card has been being declined for no reason. I have called my bank and sonic support only for them to say they have no answer. Please fix this ASAP!

I LOVE this app. It works great. There are a couple things I would like to see added. At some locations there are items on the menu that aren’t on the app - the breakfast croissant for one. Not a big deal. 

I would really like a Tip option added though, for the times I do not have any cash on me. I usually tip my carhop, especially if I order a meal, or have a large order. I don’t always have cash though. I know others have mentioned this too. 

Love it though! Use it a few times a week.
I wish I could add a tip from the app because I don’t alwYs have cash
Very easy and convenient!
I had a free birthday shake and when I came to sonic they said they were out of bananas. I didn’t complain. But it was ok. It’s still the best sonic ever.

title.label: Fine, but for the sake of your carhops..

content.label: Can y’all please add a tip button like other apps? We are in a pandemic and carhops are underpaid. Not everyone keeps cash on them because of the shortage, and not everyone wants to handle cash that’s been touched by a bunch of other people. Otherwise, it’s a good app, but this feature should have always been there.
I paid for something three times  when I only ordered it once and she only gave me one and and then walked away.
Would love salads Awesome service Great Burgers Awesome service Great Burgers

Ordering from this app continually says card declined or there was a problem, but charges you anyway. Don’t screw up and keep trying it and find out it’s still charging you every time you retry it. 80 bucks and never got the order to go through.
Works great and love the savings for ordering with the app. Just wish is showed prices before getting to the end.
Love the savings, and never had issues with the app. Highly recommend. It’s worth the free download.
Some of the items on the sonic menu is on the app. You can’t do half and half on drinks. Green chiles is not a option either. Little tweaks here and there and it will be great.
I love SONIC! I’m there at least twice a week. I would love the option of tipping the car hops. They work really hard and deserve a little love too.
Always fast and friendly!
Please add tip option!
